title: The News Desk
overview: Tom Newton Dunn will present TalkTV's 7pm weeknight hour-long news and current affairs programme, to be titled The News Desk. A world-beating stable of specialist journalists from print and broadcast will join Tom every night to share the very latest in their fields, including reporters from The Times, The Sun, Talksport and The Wall Street Journal.The show will also feature a regular rotating discussion panel.
